patthana23.40:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.40:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.40:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
